- *For other implementations of the monster, see [Cerberus](/wiki/Cerberus "Cerberus").*

**Cerberus**, d, is a unique [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in the data of [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). He is a monster that is part of the [canine](/wiki/Canine "Canine") [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class"), and is a [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous") [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal") that is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong"), has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"), can be seen via [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"), and cannot be made [tame](/wiki/Tame "Tame").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Cerberus is much stronger compared to [his incarnation](/wiki/Cerberus_\(monster\) "Cerberus (monster)") in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*.

Cerberus has three strong bite attacks and a [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire") [breath weapon](/wiki/Breath_weapon "Breath weapon"), and possesses [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance"), [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance"), [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), [disintegration resistance](/wiki/Disintegration_resistance "Disintegration resistance"), and [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance").

[Eating](/wiki/Eating "Eating") Cerberus's [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") has a chance of conveying fire resistance.

## Generation

Cerberus is not generated anywhere, but has rules governing his generation like any other monster.

Cerberus will always be created hostile, and he is not a valid target for [polymorph](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph").

## Encyclopedia entry

Cerberus, (or Kerberos in Greek), was the three-headed dog  
that guarded the Gates of Hell. He allowed any dead to enter,  
and likewise prevented them all from ever leaving. He was  
bested only twice: once when Orpheus put him to sleep by  
playing bewitching music on his lyre, and the other time when  
Hercules confronted him and took him to the world of the  
living (as his twelfth and last labor).

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [monst.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 533](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line533 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c")

Cerberus (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
d Cerberus
Difficulty 22
Attacks Bite 6d8 physical, Bite 6d8 physical, Bite 4d8 physical, Breath weapon 3d8 fire
d Cerberus
Difficulty 22
Attacks

Bite 6d8 physical, Bite 6d8 physical, Bite 4d8 physical, Breath weapon 3d8 fire

Base level 17

Speed 16
Base AC 2
Base MR 50
Alignment −7 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 1000
Nutritional value 350
Size large
Resistances fire, stoning, poison, disintegration, sleep
Resistances conveyed fire

Cerberus:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • cannot be tamed.
Reference SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line533
For other implementations of the monster, see Cerberus.

Cerberus, d, is a unique monster that appears in the data of SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM. He is a monster that is part of the canine monster class, and is a carnivorous animal that is strong, has infravision, can be seen via infravision, and cannot be made tame.[1] Cerberus is much stronger compared to his incarnation in NetHack.

Cerberus has three strong bite attacks and a fire breath weapon, and possesses fire resistance, stoning resistance, poison resistance, disintegration resistance, and sleep resistance.

Eating Cerberus's corpse or tin has a chance of conveying fire resistance.

Generation

Cerberus is not generated anywhere, but has rules governing his generation like any other monster.

Cerberus will always be created hostile, and he is not a valid target for polymorph.

Encyclopedia entry

Cerberus, (or Kerberos in Greek), was the three-headed dog
that guarded the Gates of Hell. He allowed any dead to enter,
and likewise prevented them all from ever leaving. He was
bested only twice: once when Orpheus put him to sleep by
playing bewitching music on his lyre, and the other time when
Hercules confronted him and took him to the world of the
living (as his twelfth and last labor).

References

  1. ↑ monst.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 533

'''Cerberus''', {{magenta|d}}, is a unique [[monster]] that appears in the data of [[SLASH'EM]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. He is a monster that is part of the [[canine]] [[monster class]], and is a [[carnivorous]] [[animal]] that is [[strong]], has [[infravision]], can be seen via [[infravision]], and cannot be made [[tame]].{{refsrc|monst.c|533|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}} Cerberus is much stronger compared to [[Cerberus (monster)|his incarnation]] in ''[[NetHack]]''.

Cerberus has three strong bite attacks and a [[fire]] [[breath weapon]], and possesses [[fire resistance]], [[stoning resistance]], [[poison resistance]], [[disintegration resistance]], and [[sleep resistance]].

[[Eating]] Cerberus's [[corpse]] or [[tin]] has a chance of conveying fire resistance.

==Generation==
Cerberus is not generated anywhere, but has rules governing his generation like any other monster.

Cerberus will always be created hostile, and he is not a valid target for [[polymorph]].

==Encyclopedia entry==
{{encyclopedia|
	Cerberus, (or Kerberos in Greek), was the three-headed dog
	that guarded the Gates of Hell.  He allowed any dead to enter,
	and likewise prevented them all from ever leaving.  He was
	bested only twice:  once when Orpheus put him to sleep by
	playing bewitching music on his lyre, and the other time when
	Hercules confronted him and took him to the world of the
	living (as his twelfth and last labor).
